meanings.definition: The process of preserving or keeping something in good condition.
meanings.sent1: Regular maintenance of your car can help prevent costly repairs.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance of the garden involves watering and weeding.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to do maintenance on my bike, and now it's squeaking like a mouse!
meanings.sent4: Just like a well-oiled machine, our team runs smoothly with proper maintenance.
meanings.sent5: The maintenance of friendships requires time and effort to stay strong.

meanings.definition: The act of providing support or sustenance.
meanings.sent1: The maintenance of the family fell on her shoulders after her parents passed away.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance of the community center is crucial for its continued operation.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were the maintenance of the party, keeping everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Kind words are the maintenance of a healthy relationship.
meanings.sent5: The maintenance of morale in the office is essential for productivity.

meanings.definition: The work of keeping something in proper condition.
meanings.sent1: The maintenance of the building includes cleaning and repairs.
meanings.sent2: Regular maintenance of the HVAC system ensures it functions efficiently.
meanings.sent3: His maintenance of the lawn was so meticulous, it looked like a golf course.
meanings.sent4: The maintenance of a positive attitude is key to facing challenges.
meanings.sent5: Proper maintenance of equipment can extend its lifespan.
